data.title: Djibouti
data.text:
Djibouti has been a member of the International Labour Organisation since 1978. ILO activities in the country are coordinated by the ILO Country Office for Ethiopia, Djibouti, Somalia, Sudan and South Sudan, based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

For more information and resources, please visit the French page.
